homeAbout: I am Fullstack Devloper and I love to code and stay up to date about technologies and I'm passionate about what I do.
aboutMe:
Hi, I'm Rushi Panchariya, I'm Full stack Developer + i love work on Project & Ideas + loves challenging assignments.

I'm fascinated in Cloud, IoT, Open-source & also like new Programming languages, New Techologies. I like to play Games with my friends, it gives me stress relief & sometimes I stream on YouTube or Twitch. While coding, I enjoy listening to music and producing EDM in my spare time.

My Life is LEARN + CODE + GAMING + WATCH ( SERIES, MOVIES, ANIME )+Fitness

EDUCATION

Bachelor of engineering in Computer Engineering, from Pune University, in 2021.

projects.description: It's a project that allows you to rapidly write down what's on your mind and make a shopping list. Flutter was used to create it, while Google Firebase was used for the database, hosting, and Google functions. It is currently available on the Google Play Store.
Developing a smart meter (Non-invasive) which takes reading of power. Using that data we are further implementing regression for prediction and classification for classifying appliances used.
